data.title: American Military University (AMU)
data.meta_description: We are an online university that offers affordable, accredited, and career-focused programs with monthly class starts.
data.text:
Preferred Military Rate

AMU's Preferred Military Rate of $250 per credit hour and $290/credit for master's-level courses is available to all U.S. active-duty servicemembers, National Guard members, Reservists and military families, including parents, spouses, legal partners, siblings, and dependents.

Veteran Grant

All veterans and family members (parents, spouses, legal partners, siblings, and dependents) are eligible to receive a 10% Veterans Grant on standard undergraduate and 15% for master’s-level tuition.

Tuition grants cannot be combined and only one tuition grant can be applied per course registration.

No-cost ebooks

To minimize out-of-pocket costs, the University also provides no-cost ebooks for all undergraduate, doctoral, and Preferred Military rate eligible master’s-level students.

Join fellow servicemembers and start the next chapter of your life reducing the burden of college debt by advancing your education at AMU.
